Title: Dembe Zuma (No. 10)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Brandon Margolis, Brandon Sonnier
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Amir Arison
Plot: After weeks of hunting for Dembe, Reddington and the Task Force finally get a lead on his location when Aram goes missing. Meanwhile, Dembe takes a calculated risk as Reddington closes in.
